head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEW, ANNA JACOB.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEW, ANNA JACOB.

block.p: LEW-Anna Jacob. Mesivtha Tifereth Jerusalem and the Yeshiva of Staten Island mourn the passing of the beloved mother of our dear friends and staunch supporters of Torah and our Yeshiva, Marvin and Harold Jacob and their entire families. May they be comforted among the Mourners of Zion and Israel. Rabbi David Feinstein Rabbi Reuven Feinstein Roshei HaYeshiva Rabbi Yisrael H. Eidelman Executive Vice President
